Class TuffyInferenceAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rapidminer.operator.modelling.adapters.MLNAbstractAdapter

  • public class TuffyInferenceAdapter
extends MLNInferenceAdapter
    Defines an implementation of an inference adapter for Tuffy.
    Author:
    Yann Kiraly
